text.author: J36miles, Mbrickn, Pnaha0 and other (see URL)
text.title: Cleveland
text.summary: This article details some of the history of Cleveland, Ohio, and its attractions, including museums (the Cleveland Museum of Art, HealthSpace, Rock and Roll Hall of Fame), professional sports venues (Progressive Field, QuickenLoans Arena, Cleveland Browns Stadium, Wolstein Center), most golf courses per capita in the US, and a "Big Five" orchestra.
